EmailTemplate.name: Introduction to your new Business Manager (1347477919.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Introduction to your new Business Manager (1347477919.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Mark, It was a pleasure working with you up to this point! We appreciate your on-going business. As I mentioned during your enrollment, you’ll now work with your new Business Manager, Matt Small here at MBO Partners, who will be your one point of contact should you have any questions. I’ve already informed Matt of important details regarding your working arrangement. As a reminder you may always go to private informational page <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCbFlWs0Ehy%2FuUI6Dh0TbPd%2FLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> for answers to frequently asked questions. Matt will be reaching out to you shortly to introduce himself. Best of luck and take care! Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> If you are in the DC area please check out our upcoming networking event! <http://events.r20.constantcontact.com/register/event?oeidk=a07e6cqaqtk0702919f&llr=kp5x6qkab> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
